column4: can anyone help me getting my radeon 9700 pro working with 3d accel. in ubuntu?
more specifically, can't get direct rendering running with xorg
i have been fking about with help from whyz this evening
i'm a new to linux today
tried a few things but not all working
but instead of using dpkg-reconfigure run fglrxconfig
run fglrxconfig and make sure you remove the nvidia module
also, go into the file that it made called XFree86Conf-4 or whatever and change Keyboard to keyboard
just pick ps/2 with a wheel
go in and change, Keyboard to keyboard
then after you change Keyboard to keyboard rename it to xorg.conf... and yes the second line
